properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.chat-memory-provider
properties.description: Chat Memory Provider of type dev.langchain4j.memory.ChatMemoryProvider. Note for this to be successful, you need to use a reliable ChatMemoryStore. This provider supposes that a user has multiple sessions, if need only a single session, use a default memoryId. The option is a dev.langchain4j.memory.chat.ChatMemoryProvider type.

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.chat-model
properties.description: Chat Model of type dev.langchain4j.model.chat.ChatModel. The option is a dev.langchain4j.model.chat.ChatModel type.

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.configuration
properties.description: The configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.langchain4j.agent.LangChain4jAgentConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the langchain4j-agent component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.input-guardrails
properties.description: Comma-separated list of input guardrail class names to validate user input before sending to LLM

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.output-guardrails
properties.description: Comma-separated list of output guardrail class names to validate LLM responses

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.retrieval-augmentor
properties.description: Retrieval Augmentor for advanced RAG of type dev.langchain4j.rag.RetrievalAugmentor. This allows using RAG on both Naive and Advanced RAG. The option is a dev.langchain4j.rag.RetrievalAugmentor type.

properties.name: camel.component.langchain4j-agent.tags
properties.description: Tags for discovering and calling Camel route tools
